rooms.description: Grand entrance hall with ample lighting and a welcome area.
Spacious living room designed for relaxation and social gatherings. Vastu aligned to ensure positive energy flow.
Dining area with an adjacent kitchen. The layout adheres to Vastu principles by placing dining in the east.
Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with dining area, ensuring ease of movement and good ventilation as per local building norms.
Master bedroom positioned in the southwest direction to enhance personal growth and relaxation. Includes walk-in closet.
En suite bathroom for master bedroom ensuring privacy and convenience.
Secondary bedroom in the north-west direction to balance energy flow.
Additional bedroom in the north-east direction for balanced energy distribution as per Vastu.
Dedicated home theater area with acoustic treatment and ambient lighting. Placed in the southeast to enhance positive energy.

openings.description: Primary entry with adequate space for vehicular movement and welcoming natural light.
East-facing windows to maximize sunlight as per Vastu principles.
Balcony overlooking the garden area to enhance relaxation and energy flow.

swimming_pool.description: Luxury swimming pool integrated with the villa design. Provides relaxation and recreational space.
